review: Great product!  I put this on the TV in our master bedroom because we already get streaming through our DVD player.  It comes up almost instantly and buffers quickly unlike the DVD player.  I have had not issues with it at all.  If I had a third HDMI plug on the TV in the family room, I'd get another Fire Stick.
